categories: Category:Starships of the Order of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Infernum was a Zeta-class shuttle used by the Sith Lord Darth Vader, the Sixth Brother, Ninth Sister, and the Tenth Brother to travel to the planet Mon Cala to hunt an enemy of the Galactic Empire. The ship was destroyed during the Battle of Dac City.
The Infernum first appeared in the canon comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 13 written by Charles Soule, penciled by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and released in 2018.
